Reconstruction and segmentation
-------------------------------

	KBLT Python reconstruction package and Jupyter Notebook reconstruction scripts can be found on:	
	:cite:`larsson_kblt`

	Example Jupyter Notebook reconstruction and segementation scripts can also be found here in below:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 5
   
   notebooks/KBLT_LavaLamp_4D_reconstruction
   notebooks/KBLT_LavaLamp_segmentation
